value.name: The Frontier: When police shoot tribal citizens on Muscogee Nation land, families ask “who’s held accountable?”
value.description: Tribal Nations are being asked to take on more responsibility when it comes to policing, prosecution and when families experience something tragic like one of their loved ones getting shot
